wikimediaapiportal-skin-wikimedia-info: The Wikimedia Foundation, Inc is a nonprofit charitable organisation dedicated to encouraging the growth, development and distribution of free, multilingual content, and to providing the full content of these wiki-based projects to the public free of charge.
